content.text: Hey I'm from LA, what about you?
I'm from Ohio! But I'm currently living in LA for college.
I've never heard of food science before! What's that all about?
It's about food, and how to make it safe! I love it so much!
That's really cool! I'm a huge foodie myself. I love to cook and bake.
Me too! I love making new recipes and trying new foods.
Do you have a favorite food?
I love fries! I love trying different kinds of fries from all over the world.
Fries are my favorite too! I love them with ketchup, mayo, and cheese.
Me too! I also like them with ranch dressing.
That sounds amazing! I'm so hungry now.
Me too! Maybe we should go get some fries sometime.
That would be so much fun! I'm free tomorrow if you are.
Me too! I'll see you tomorrow!
